about.title: About Pavithra Stories
about.text: At Pavithra Stories, we believe every wedding is more than an event â€” it is a story written with love, traditions, emotions, and unforgettable moments. Based in Bengaluru, we specialize in wedding photography and cinematic films that feel natural, elegant, and deeply personal. From grand South Indian weddings to intimate ceremonies, portraits, and lifestyle shoots, our approach is simple: observe quietly, feel deeply, and capture honestly.
